name: octra-source
author: Julian Pömp, Christoph Draxler; Institut für Phonetik und Sprachverarbeitung, LMU München

scripts.build:web-components: nx build ngx-components && nx build web-components --outputHashing none && node prepare_web-components.js
scripts.deploy:octra:dev:beta: npm run build:dev:update:beta && npm run package:octra:dev && ./deploy.sh octra-2-dev
scripts.package:octra:dev: cd dist/apps && rm -f octra-2-dev.zip 2> /dev/null && zip -q -r octra-2-dev.zip octra && cd -
scripts.deploy:octra:prod:beta: npm run build:prod:update:beta && npm run package:octra:prod && ./deploy.sh octra-2
scripts.deploy:octra:prod: npm run build:prod:update && npm run package:octra:prod && ./deploy.sh octra-2
scripts.package:octra:prod: cd dist/apps && rm -f octra-2.zip 2> /dev/null && zip -q -r octra-2.zip octra && cd -
scripts.release:app:octra: npm run build:release && nx run octra:version --push
scripts.release:lib:annotation: node runner.js build:lib annotation && nx run annotation:version --push
scripts.publish:lib:annotation: node runner.js build:lib annotation && nx npm annotation
scripts.release:lib:assets: node runner.js build:assets && nx run assets:version --releaseAs=patch --push
scripts.publish:lib:assets: node runner.js build:assets && nx npm assets
scripts.release:lib:json-sets: node runner.js build:lib json-sets && nx run json-sets:version --push
scripts.publish:lib:json-sets: node runner.js build:lib json-sets && nx npm json-sets
scripts.release:lib:media: node runner.js build:lib media && nx run media:version --push
scripts.publish:lib:media: node runner.js build:lib media && nx npm media
scripts.release:lib:ngx-components: node runner.js build:lib ngx-components && nx run ngx-components:version --push
scripts.publish:lib:ngx-components: node runner.js build:lib ngx-components && nx npm ngx-components
scripts.release:lib:ngx-utilities: node runner.js build:lib ngx-utilities && nx run ngx-utilities:version --push
scripts.publish:lib:ngx-utilities: node runner.js build:lib ngx-utilities && nx npm ngx-utilities
scripts.release:lib:utilities: node runner.js build:lib utilities && nx run utilities:version --push
scripts.publish:lib:utilities: node runner.js build:lib utilities && nx npm utilities
scripts.release:lib:web-media: node runner.js build:lib web-media && nx run web-media:version --push
scripts.publish:lib:web-media: node runner.js build:lib web-media && nx npm web-media
scripts.analyze:octra: nx build octra --configuration production --stats-json && webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/apps/octra/stats.json
